transcript: You were fine during the phone call from Marge. Dinner was okay. Doing the dishes was no problem. Let's see, I took a shower. Uh, you watched the news. You said the grunions are running tonight. I said, great, let's go. I feel lucky tonight.

segments.text: You were fine during the phone call from Marge. Dinner was okay.
Doing the dishes was no problem.
Let's see, I took a shower.
Uh, you watched the news. You said the grunions are running tonight.
I said, great, let's go. I feel lucky tonight.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: You were fine during the phone call from Marge.  Dinner was okay.  Doing the dishes was no problem.  Let's see, I took a shower.  Uh, you watched the news.  You said the grunions are running tonight.  I said great, let's go.  I feel lucky tonight.
